<div id="data_types" class="registered_link"></div>

EDB Postgres Advanced Server has the following data types.

- [Numeric types](01_numeric_types.mdx)
- [Monetary types](monetary_types)
- [Character types](02_character_types)
- [Binary data types](03_binary_data)
- [Date/time types](04_date_time_types)
- [Boolean type](05_boolean_type)
- [Enumerated types](enumerated_types)
- [Geometric types](geometric_types)
- [Network address types](network_address_types)
- [Arrays](array_types)
- [Composite types](composite_types)
- [Range types](range_types)
- [Object Identifier types](object_identifier_types)
- [Pseudo-types](psuedo_types)
